author: Tom Graham
comment: I'm not a big fan of the newest update but it's still the best shopping app out there. The pictures make all the difference so that instead of seeing "Milk" on the list, you can see exactly what milk to get. The new round photos though are a problem. Most of my stuff comes in square boxes rather than round ones (except a few cheeses) and I get messed in the store up trying to find the round box of Cheerios. ;)   Sync between devices is perfect (and automatic) so I'll give it the sixth star.

author: Stanis Hopla
comment: This is the first time I installed this shopping app and found out that we can add items to the database but we  can't search for pictures online. What a shame. So only 3 stars

author: Paul O
comment: And yet another poorly implemented Wearable app. No ability to make, add to or amend a list via the Wearable. Yet?

author: Lauro Ignácio
comment: Easy to use and very useful.

author: Bethany Bronickis
comment: It's almost perfect! Shame it doesn't allow you to delete multiple grocery items from the main list,  as it comes with a presaved list full of items I would never purchase, so I have to go through and individually select each one and delete! Would be so much easier if you could select multiple items to delete at a time

author: Garrison Collette
comment: Easy to use as a shopping list...cart price included.

author: Connie Faye
comment: really DISLIKE the update.  Being able to EDIT items AS YOU ADD THEM TO YOUR LIST was why I liked it.  It's such a PAIN IN THE ASS. Entirely why I left Listonic.

author: Kathleen Shaver
comment: This WAS my favorite app......then someone decided it should be UPDATED. Why? It is sooooo much harder to use now!!!!

author: B. J. Wilson
comment: This was my favorite app till you updated it.  Now you can't add a item.  Why did you update it so nothing works

author: Sadique Muqadam
comment: Its a decent app, I used grocery king earlier its very similar in terms of custmization n organising. Request, Please add option to backup from phone memory also because incase of phone loss or phone not working,its than easy to restore. i liked grocery king , the only problem with that was they stopped updates for app n their cloud sync wasnt working,therefore i lost all customisation i made,in new mobile i have to recreate everything
Works great, under product detail add purchase price sell price And backup so can be shared between devices easily

author: Prakash Rock
comment: Please add three more options.list and category area add searching bar . And also add reminders option.

author: PT Curtiss
comment: Barcode Reader is pathetic!

author: K N
comment: Nice app which we can add item name, quantity , cost. So we can check how much item price we are going at cash counter. user interface need to be beautify, its boring. we can't gather items of our wish from various lists at one place. every time we aren't purchase whole list, we have to create new list.

author: Tek Man
comment: Thank you for this app it is pretty thorough. I would like to see an option for categorising items into user editable shops as this would enable me to compare prices. History save function though yet to use will be helpful Just an addendum Thanks for pointing out the coupon section. Suggestion While I can save purchases in history it would be helpful if I could save pending lists for different shops as we all shop at various outlets. This would enable us to recall and load up the current list we need to use. Thanks again

author: John Kimbell
comment: I like this shopping list app very much, it's one of the best I have tried. It's easy to use with a very nice interface. I would like to see larger check boxes.

author: Lucas Mello
comment: Nice app. It would be nice if we could choose the payment type to put on history. It'd be very useful!

author: Brittney Princivalli
comment: Love this app! This is exactly what I have been looking for. Thank you

author: evelyn woolston
comment: At last, a decent shopping list app.  It lets you have more than one list (for different stores perhaps).  You can cross out items as you put them in your cart. It sorts the items into catagories too so they will be together in the store.I thought the pictures would be unnecessary but they are actually very helpful when scanning down a list quickly in a crowded store. You can photograph a particular item in the shop and then use that pic to remind you which one to get

author: Dan Hildebrandt
comment: Looks like a very good app with great potential. One of the things it needs is a Web Search for Images that could then be saved for products stored.

author: Deaf Lion
comment: dont like link cloud, want link by google drive or Bluetooth. they cost £2.99 for cloud and this apps too cost rip off £4.99 no thank you and cannot remove picture so uninstalled it

1. Include currencies for all countries in your currency field. Indian currency is missing.  2. Mostly populated with food items. Clothing and accessories are important aspects too. So, varieties in category field.  3. Certain items have images / photos missing.  Please upload it. There is internet.  Otherwise, a wonderful app.

author: Randy Glaus
comment: Can't add item photos by searching the internet. Everything else looks good but I won't use this app without internet search.  Update: Still want internet search for photos, but decided I really like the ability to add prices and quantities. Very useful.
title: Useful, but...

author: Anand Pereira
comment: I loved that u can attach pics to the grocery items. I was lookin for something like this & i found it. Highly recommended
title: Awesome simple app for groceries

author: Danica Anuncio
comment: This is what I've been looking for. Everytime I go for shopping I use this app for computations.
title: All I want!

author: Kat R
comment: My old app included a simple sync button to sync between devices. Always had a current list on all my devices. This one, you have to pay for this feature. Not worth it to me. There are plenty of good (almost identical) apps that do it for free, if it is that important to you. (Or you can just pay the fee) Other than that, I LOVE it! Very similar to the" Out Of Milk" app only without all the bugs and with some even better features. Would 5+++ stars if the sync was free.
title: Would be 5++++ with free sync

author: MiSTAKE METAMORPHiSM
comment: It has almost everything you can think of.  However, I'd love to see EBT be factored into the prices so those on food stamps could know exactly how much of their SNAP balance they'll be using and how much of their total grocery bill will be paid via other forms of payment.
title: Simple but VERY effective grocery list!

author: Ramesh Prajapat
comment: I'm purchase softlist software & sine in but say softlist "INCORRECT EMAIL OR PASSWORD PLZ HELP...

reply.author: Martins Softwares
reply.content:
Hello Ramesh.

For help please email us at contato@softlist.com.br

Regards,

SoftList Team.

title: It's ok

author: Linda Sheehan
comment: Thanks for making a grocery list app so easy to use. love everything about it. So far it works great. No problems with it at all. GREAT...
title: Best grocery app ever

author: Nandakumar A
comment: Sharing Option is required in Purchase History. Otherwise very good app.....
title: Nandakumar

author: Gerda Bos
comment: This is what I've been looking for ages.
title: Love it

author: Brian Oliver
comment: I tested out most of the free shopping list apps before settling on Softlist.  It is easy to set up and maintain Food shopping lists.  Set up a regular list and just copy onto your weekly list . Searching is easy with both voice and written.  Prices can be changed when shopping straight from your current list. Many great features make this an excellent app

author: Carmenita Buys
comment: Great app!! I finally found one where I can add prices and quantities... and I don't get why more people don't use it. The one that is the editors choice Is absolutely crap and looks like a kindergarten colouring book..
title: ♥♡

author: Tee Dee Em
comment: Dont know why so low rated, this app is great. Simple adds up prices and you can add pics, nice!
title: Nice

author: John Cesta
comment: How much is the sync feature after 30 days?
title: So far so good.

author: Brian Perry
comment: Second to non the best

author: Max Winter
comment: If there was a facility to sync.  Other than that, this app is a delight.....  Now it's worth 5. But -  what's with this new evaluation period??   Don't object at all to contributing a bit of cash to a good cause, but it would be courteous to warn us up front.
title: Would be 5++  . . .

author: Ellen Albig
comment: I was getting ready to make my shopping list & wishing I could sync my tablet with my phone. I opened the app & there was the update! Some wishes do come true! Thank you, thank you, thank you. I've been waiting for this for a while. Not sure why it said "Evaluation period: 30 days remaining" at the bottom. I hope you won't be charging for this feature. That would definitely change my rating.
title: Thank you for the sync feature.

author: Nicole Pickford
comment: I jumped ship from IOS to Android last week but could not remember the name of the shopping app I used to use on my iphone. I spent some time trawling through other grocery shopping apps which claimed to be simple but were not. I just want a weekly easy to compile list with ability to save items with prices, check em off when in my trolley and be able to look at my shopping history and control my food budget BEFORE I get in the car. This app is perfect please do not do any updates which will ruin it!
title: Brilliant

author: Ken Fairhurst
comment: I've tried a few shopping lists, but when I got my Moto 360 I had to find a new compatible one, and this one fits the bill.  The best list I have tried so far, easy to change and add categories and items.  Thank you.
